title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 586.8 - Amendments to rules
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 586.8 - Amendments to rules

State Regulations

This Part shall be subject to amendment or revision
through the existing college governance structure. Any amendments or revisions
thereof shall be filed as required by the board of trustees within 30 days
after adoption by the Board of Trustees of the State University of New

York. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
586.8

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
